data.name: Lost and Hound - Artbook
data.detailed_description: This is an art book containing all of the art that is present in Lost and Hound, from gallery pieces present in the apartment level, to the development of the loading screen art. It is included as a single PDF file.
data.about_the_game: This is an art book containing all of the art that is present in Lost and Hound, from gallery pieces present in the apartment level, to the development of the loading screen art. It is included as a single PDF file.
data.short_description: This is an art book containing all of the art that is present in Lost and Hound, from gallery pieces present in the apartment level, to the development of the loading screen art. It is included as a single PDF file.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
